WorkItem.Description:
I working with PHP 7 and in this the following will cause a fatal error.

PHPExcel/Calculation/Functions.php
Line: 581 -> break;

Remove this line and it will work.
break; without a corresponding loop or switch causes 

Fatal error:  'break' not in the 'loop' or 'switch' context

in PHP7 and probably also earlier versions.

I can't upload a patch but someone could easily fix this in the svn trunk.
WorkItem.Summary: break; in wrong place - Fatal Error
